 Find and return node in XML tree with TagName and return this node content.
function UTILS_GetText (TagName)
 Get text from language selected. If TagName was not founded in language seleted, then found in Default language text. We assume that default language has all tags.

 Set breaklines inside texts Put a "<br />" tag at Obj.innerHTML if it pass the Width limit.

 Remove NumChars characteres of Word.

 Check if string has some banned words. If exist replace all characters to '*' and return new string.

 Remove an event listener from element Return true if event has removed or false if event hasn't removed.

 Check web browser type and return event object.

 Check web browser type and return event key code correctly.

function UTILS_AddListener (   Element,
  Type,
  Expression,
  Bubbling 
)

Add an event listener from element Return true if event has added or false if event hasn't added Code from: http://snipplr.com/view/561/add-event-listener/.

Parameters:
Element DOM element
Type Event type
Expression Function or action to add
Bubbling Transmite event to others elements overlayed
Returns:
True or false
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto

function UTILS_GetTime (   Timestamp  )

If timestamp is null, return current time.

Returns:

function UTILS_ShortString (   Word,
  NumChars 
)

Remove NumChars characteres of Word.

If word has more than number of characteres defined in NumChars, remove excced characters, else do nothing;

Parameters:
Word String with some text
NumChars Max numbers of characters
Returns:
New string with words changed
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto
